content: > this pattern is available for **free on my blog** 1 the downloadable pdf > listed here for sale contains the full > pattern in one printable file without > advertisements all sales are final **buy more and save purchase any 2 pattern pdfs & receive 1 free no coupon needed just add all 3 to your cart and the discount will automatically be applied ** kautna is a free headband pattern that features a trendy twist at the front the headband itself is very quick and easy to make as it s made up of basic crochet stitches back-and-forth in row **suggested yarns ** red heart chic sheep by marly bird yarnspirations bernat satin worsted weight #4 ~ 48 grams 96 yards **hook ** 5 0 mm us h-8 **gauge ** 15 single_crochet and 17 row = 4 inches **size ** teen/adult = 21 to 23 head circumference **finished measurements ** circumference = 19 inches width = 4 inches **abbreviations us terms ** chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet rs = right side single_crochet = single_crochet written patterns and images are copyright © of noowul designs all rights reserved please do not reprint or repost these patterns but please do link to my site to share the patterns with others all content on noowul com is the sole property of the site unless otherwise stated you are welcome to make items to sell for charity or for profit from these patterns as long as you don t sell or reproduce the actual written patterns please use your own photos to promote your work 1 http //noowul com/katuna-headband-free-crochet-pattern/
